embed.title: EssentialsX Discord to Minecraft Permissions
embed.description:
EssentialsX Discord requires you explictly give players permissions to receive messages from discord.

To give players the ability to see messages from a given Discord channel, give your players `essentials.discord.receive.<channel name>`. Replace `<channel name>` with the channel name used in the `channels` of your config.

For example, given the following channels section: ```yml
channels:
  primary: 390943808948535297
  staff: 606394319229812747```You would give players `essentials.discord.receive.primary` to receive messages from the `primary` channel or `essentials.discord.receive.staff` to receive messages from the `staff` channel.
